text: Q4. | Which of the following language is/are context free? L1 = {arbranb": n 20}, = = {a, b}. L2 = {wR#z : w is a substring of z, w, z € {a, b}*}, Z = {a, b, #}. L3 = {w#z: w is a substring of z, w, z € {a, b}*}, Z = {a, b, #}. L4 = {x+y=z:x +y=zinunary wherex, y,z € 11*}, Z = {1, +, =}. (A) L3 and L4 only (B) L2 and L4 only (C) L4 only (D) None
